name: Connell, Appellant, v. Kennett Township Board of School Directors et al.
name_abbreviation: Connell v. Kennett Township Board of School Directors

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
parties: Connell, Appellant, v. Kennett Township Board of School Directors et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The judgment of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Harvey.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: J. Paul MacElree, with him Larmore & Scarlett, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Connell, Appellant, v. Kennett Township Board of School Directors et al.
Argued April 15, 1947.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearns and Jones, JJ.
Samuel Lichtenfeld, for appellant.
J. Paul MacElree, with him Larmore & Scarlett, for appellees.
May 7, 1947:
